entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reassigning ItemsLayout in .NET MAUI CollectionView Prevents Dynamic Span Change #24345
  • [Windows] UI Virtualization broken in Listviews #24343
  • [Testing] StreamImageSource.GetDrawableAsync currently doesn't work when ran in release mode on Core.DeviceTests #24338
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Fix Controls.Device Tests so they can run as release #24337
    Backlog
  • MAUI blazor form HTML POST AND JS POST DO NOT WORK #24336
    Backlog
  • MauiImage from NuGet package target is not included in Android App #24331
  • [MacCatalyst] Using LINQ Sum in a property getter make release binary crash #24330
  • Unable to deploy MAUI app to ios 16.1 #24324

Closed

  • [MAUI]I9_Scrolling_Scroll mode when adding items page throws' Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException Message=Invalid target position' after setting UpdatingScrollMode #24272
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [Android] Add Android LoadImageFromFont benchmark and enable verbose Glide logging #24320
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Runtime pack errors for new MAUI project #24187
  • Publishing to BAR/Maestro will no longer support tokens #23974

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix inset adjustment #24344
  • Obsolete Compatibility.Layout #24342
  • Merge `main` into `net9.0` #24341
  • Update FlyoutPage.cs #24339
    community ✨
  • Make the screenshot comparison more strict #24335
  • Optimize UI Tests build time in CI by only building TestCases.HostApp #24334
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Migrate xml docs directly into code for ExtensionPoints #24333
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Move some absolute layout api docs directly in code #24332
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2592.51` to `1.0.2651.64` #24329
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.5.5 to 1.5.6 #24328
    community ✨
  • Remove excessive ListView API doc #24327
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24325
    community ✨
  • Develop/net9.0 maonaoda custom fix #24323
    community ✨
  • add mapper for IsSwipePagingEnabledProperty on Android #24322
    community ✨
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr8] Update the mac/iOS workloads #24321

Merged

  • [Android] Add test for scroll without group #24288
    platform/android 🤖, i/regression
  • Backport maestro and artifact drop infra improvements from net9.0 #24247
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Android LoadImageFromFont benchmark and enable verbose Glide logging #24033
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Update extensions packages #24317
  • Disable template tests until we can resolve crash #24315
  • [net9.0] Update arcade on net9.0 #24318
  • [Windows] Optimize `WrapperView` #24281
    community ✨

Updated

  • [Testing] moved FlyoutHeaderAdaptsToMinimumHeight to appium #24294
    community ✨, testing-green-ci
  • Fix SafeArea adjustments #23729
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
  • Remove non-functioning code and instead throw a more helpful platform-not-supported error #23617
    community ✨
  • [Android] Allow custom background drawable with a custom handler #22573
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-entry, area-controls-datetimepicker, area-controls-editor
  • 2174059 MAUI hit testing ignores pages loaded by PushModalAsync #24109
  • Build the previous TFMs #23896
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1
  • [X] Match behavior of compiled bindings with indexers to their non-compiled counterparts #24229
  • [net9.0] Fix API23 Core device tests #24128
    testing-green-ci
  • [net9.0] Fix loop CarouselViewHandler2 #24230
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-image
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    community ✨
  • Migrate iOS from NavigationRenderer to NavigationViewHandler #20759
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fix cake script to generate screenshots locally #24319
  • Match behavior of compiled bindings with indexers to their counterparts #24256
  • [iOS] Bugfix/22469 ios label crash #22487
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Make `MeasureInvalidated` event work correctly #23052
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • Fix `dotnet new maui` trim warnings when publish with trimMode full #24314
  • [Binding SG] Enable usage of private fields and properties in SetBinding path #23810
    area-xaml
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
  • Update the mac/iOS workloads #24263
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [XC] Fallback to reflection-based bindings for bindings with "invalid" path #24238
  • Revert "[ios] fix memory leak in CollectionView cells (#15831)" #24310
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Entry clear button is not taking the color of the text. #24196
    community ✨
  • Fixed the CollectionView GroupFooterTemplate crashes the application #24205
    community ✨
  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161
    community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24209
    community ✨
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • Improve performance and stability of `BindableLayout` #23136
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [Windows] Skip initial assignments in property mapper (take 3) #23987
    community ✨
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for the CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #24160
    community ✨
  • RefreshView IsEnabled enhancements #24290
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-refreshview
